ygData.subject: Hangouts for teens
ygData.msgSnippet: I am fairly new to EQ and have been trying various class-race combos to see what I like.  I now have three character between level 10 and 15.  I have been
ygData.messageBody:
I am fairly new to EQ and have been trying various class-race combos to see
what I like. I now have three character between level 10 and 15. I have
been going to Crushbone alot to hunt, and the tower in the field of bone is
cool but I am getting tired of the same old stuff. Where else can a
character in the 10-20 range go to hunt where he can find a group easily? I
have looked over the EQ Atlas and see a lot of stuff for 1-10 and 30+.
Since I may try some more class-race combos before I try and take anybody
over 20 I could use some more places to fill the gap between newbie and
experienced. I am not interested in power-leveling.

I have EQ Evolution, so every expansion but LDON. I play on the Tunare
(sp?) server.

Thanks!
